rules: Rule1: If the raw material is received, then whenever the catalyst is expired, the catalyst is not effective.
Rule2: Under the condition that the pilot batch is initiated, the reaction mixture is filtered.
Rule3: Either the pilot batch is initiated or the commercial batch is initiated.
Rule4: If the commercial batch is initiated, then under the condition that regulatory standards are not compliant, the final inspection is passed.
Rule5: Provided that the excipients are mixed, then if regulatory standards are not compliant, the final inspection is passed.
Rule6: Whenever the reaction vessel is heated, the excipients are mixed.
Rule7: If the reaction vessel is pressurized, then the reaction vessel is heated.
Rule8: Under the condition that the reaction vessel is cooled, the reaction vessel is pressurized.
Rule9: Provided that the reaction mixture is filtered, the reaction vessel is cooled.
Rule10: If the quality check is approved, then it is not the case that the chemical batch is contaminated.
Rule11: Whenever aseptic filling is performed, then either the clean room is available or regulatory standards are compliant.
Rule12: Aseptic filling is performed or vial capping is performed.
Rule13: Provided that the finished product is rejected, then the finished product is not contaminated.
Rule14: Under the condition that the finished product is quarantined, the finished product is destroyed.
Rule15: Whenever the finished product is destroyed, the finished product is rejected.
Rule16: If an impurity is detected, then provided that regulatory standards are not compliant, the chemical batch is not contaminated.
Rule17: Either an impurity is detected or microbial growth is detected.
Rule18: If microbial growth is detected, then a pH deviation is detected.
Rule19: If a pH deviation is detected, then a viscosity issue is detected.
Rule20: Under the condition that the production line is scheduled, the production line is operational.
Rule21: If the production line is scheduled, then it is not the case that the production line is operational.
Rule22: Either the production line is scheduled or, under the condition that regulatory standards are not compliant, the quality check is approved.
Rule23: Provided that a viscosity issue is detected, then if regulatory standards are not compliant, the chemical batch is not contaminated.
Rule24: If the shipment is delayed, then the deadline is missed.
Rule25: Provided that management is escalated, temporary staff is hired.
Rule26: Under the condition that management is escalated, it is not the case that the protocol is reviewed.
Rule27: Either management is escalated or the deadline is not missed.
Rule28: Whenever overtime is authorized, the protocol is reviewed.
Rule29: Either the production schedule is extended or, if temporary staff is hired, overtime is authorized.
Rule30: Provided that the active ingredient is available, regulatory standards are compliant.
Rule31: If the stability test is completed, then the testing equipment is calibrated.
Rule32: Either the stability test is completed or sterilization is performed.
Rule33: If the catalyst is expired, then the catalyst is effective.
Rule34: Either the catalyst is expired or, if sterilization is performed, the active ingredient is available.
Rule35: If it is not the case that if vial capping is performed then either the clean room is available or regulatory standards are compliant, then the finished product is contaminated.
Rule36: Provided that it is not the case that if vial capping is performed then either the clean room is available or regulatory standards are compliant, the finished product is quarantined.
Rule37: If it is not the case that if the active ingredient is not available then a backup supplier is ordered, then the shipment is delayed.
Rule38: If the active ingredient is not available, then it is not the case that a backup supplier is ordered.
Rule39: Under the condition that regulatory standards are not compliant, the chemical batch is contaminated.
facts: Fact1: The raw material is received.
Fact2: It is not the case that the final inspection is passed.
Fact3: The clean room is not available.
Fact4: The production schedule is not extended.
Fact5: The testing equipment is not calibrated.
